reviews.review: Superb!

Amazingly addictive puzzle gaming.  Normal Valve top quality and the voice acting of GlaDOS is superb.  I know her personally and she even spoke highly of the quality Valve required to do the voice over work.  Overall, a splendid puzzle ROMP!

The game is enjoyable but it didn't age well. It's very short, the puzzles are pretty simple and aside from a few cases where you might get stuck because you don't see something obvious, you just blast through them without much challenge at all. There's no reason to play this game because there's an absolutely fantastic Portal 2 out there that is better and bigger in every aspect, and so many years later it's release the community is still making new maps. For people who never played Portal games before, or new to puzzle games in general, i'd still recommend to stay away because of what i said above and additionally because to my mind Portal 2 provides a much better tutorial and has better pacing in terms of variety and difficulty.

The first Portal is an experiment by Valve as well as a title used to add more value/complete the orange box. And I'm happy to say that portal is a TRIUMPH.*sorry.  Portal technology and all the things Valve were able to do with just the portal gun and the environment design is incredible. The start of the game is very straight forward and pretty slow. But the later puzzles are creative, thought provoking and rewards, "thinking with portals." While there is only one character, GlaDOS' sarcasm, humor, and constant communication is great in an otherwise game with no personality. While the game is short, it's still unforgettable. I highly recommend portal.
classic puzzle game
This is my go to game for when I just want a short game to play through.

단순하면서도 머리 쓰게 만드는 게임성 밸브사 특유의 분위기가 돋보이는 포탈 시리즈의 첫 작품.

본인이 빡대가리거나 길을 잘 못 찾는 타입이면 게임이 좀 어려울 수 있다. 내가 그래서 포탈2 하기가 무서움. 그리고 의외로 피지컬 요구하는 게임이다.

한글화는 말그대로 되어만 있는 수준. 특히 가독성이 심각하다. 다만, 이해할 게 별로 없는 게임이라 사실 딱히 한글이 아니라도 상관없다.

시대를 감안하면 그래픽은 충분하다. 애초에 게임 장르상 그래픽이 별로 문제될 건 없다. BGM은 게임 분위기상 없는 게 나은 것 같아서 역시 별로 상관없다.

처음 시작하면 아무 설명도 없어서 당황하게 되고 알아서 배우게 된다. 강하게 키우는 밸브사답다. 첫 작품답게 실험작 느낌이 물씬 나는 게임이다. 스토리 측면에선 아무래도 부실하다. 그래도 설정을 잡 잡아놨고 글라도스는 꽤 매력적이다. 엔딩도 꽤나 참신하고 좋다.
 
플레이 타임은 사람마다 다르겠지만 꽤나 짧은 편. 원가 자체가 많이 저렴해졌지만 그래도 몇 시간이면 깨는 겜이라서 좀 아쉬운 것도 사실이다. 원가 주고 사도 상관없지만 포탈을 저렴하게 구할 수 있는 방법은 많으니 고려해보자.

포탈 2를 하기 위한 예열용 작품에 가깝다. 그래도 추천이냐 비추천이냐를 따지면 추천에 가까운 작품.

Short but fun campaign. If you're a previous portal player, however, you will likely fly right through this game in 2 hours or so, even with bumps here and there. The advanced maps, however, are absolute ass: a lot of them depend on chance, or on messing with the unreliable physics of the source engine (for example, trying to use a sphere to bounce an energy ball directly into the spot you need by using several bounces and praying it randomly hits where you want it).
Прекрасная игра =)) развивает смекалку =)

One of the best and most innovative games out there, everyone knows Portal. But when I was younger and played it on my dad's computer there was one thing that I never noticed: this is one of the most unsettling games I've ever played. When I recently bought it for myself and played through it again, i remembered all of the stages, but now I could actually immerse myself in the atmosphere of the abandoned Aperture test chambers and realise how truly unsettling it was. It's something I had never noticed as a kid because I was too focused on the comedy and amazing puzzles, which are also great, but seriously, this game is creepy. I know I can't really call this a review, more of a realisation, but I highly recommend Portal.

Overall, I give Portal a 9/10. It does exactly what it wants and more. If you haven't already, buy it.

AMAZING GAME

The entire Portal franchise is a must-have. in my opinion, these games show the medium at its best. This game has such a great understanding of difficulty. it eases you in the game and introduces such a weird concept like Portals with ease. it does a fantastic job of teaching it to you just through playing it(by the way I really recommend the developer commentary if you're interested, it shows how much thought went into each and every single puzzle). 
there is not a single reason for you to not buy it and also the sequel instantly. I personally recommend you to just buy the entire Portal bundle.

Even if it's old, you should not forget the classics. Do not bother with challenges though, they're designed for exploiters and speedrunners.

Portal is a fantastic puzzle game that has so much more content after the main "Story line". There are challenges that test your knowledge of the game in fun ways. Portal is a game that everyone should play at least once. You can easily finish in 2-3 hours in your first play through. GLaDOS is a fantastic character, and the end credit scene is one of the best in gaming in my opinion. Would definitely recommend to anyone!

One of the most iconic puzzle games of all time. Portal stands the test of time and is still one of the best puzzlers around today. It's intuitive, challenging, quirky, and fun. Though, if you're going to purchase a Portal game, you'd be better off buying Portal 2, as it simply expands and improves upon the gameplay of Portal.
